dmca.title: Notice of Claims for Intellectual Property Violations
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Meredith K. Robertson [mailto:mkrobert@redhat.com] 
Posted At: Thursday, November 02, 2006 1:29 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Notice of Claims for Intellectual Property Violations
Subject: Notice of Claims for Intellectual Property Violations


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Dear Sir:

The following is a Notice for Claims of Intellectual Property
Violations.  Red Hat, Inc. requests that you immediately take down the
material listed below as Red Hat is the owner of the copyrighted
material and the material has been posted without Red Hat's permission.

1. A description of the copyrighted work is: the RHCE exam downloads
found at the following link:
http://www.sadikhov.com/forum/index.php?showtopic=67187

2.  Meredith Robertson
Legal Specialist
Red Hat, Inc.
1801 Varsity Drive
Raleigh, NC 27606
(919) 754-4460
mkrobert@redhat.com

I have a good faith belief that the disputed use is not authorized by
Red Hat, Inc., the owner of the above referenced material, its agent, or
the law.  I make this statement under penalty of perjury, that the above
information in this notice is accurate and that Red Hat, Inc. is the
copyright owner.


Meredith K. Robertson
- --
?Meredith Robertson
Legal Specialist
Legal Affairs
Red Hat, Inc.
(919) 754-4460
mkrobert@redhat.com
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.6 (GNU/Linux)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Red Hat - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD4DBQFFSkcNEmC89Oq2sKQRAt1JAJkB5Q1YgQyBDdUOolnAtfJQGLWTPgCXee5K
NxNvLrSDdciBgLWRxRWOmA==
=q+RA
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
